name: Context
tagline: A Chrome Extension by Jeshua Maxey
body:
Context is a neat Chrome extension that makes reading any Wikipedia article easier and more rewarding. Head over to the [Chrome webstore](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/context/khbphcbegchkpcfhlikpgjejoiokegpg) to install it.

Thanks goes to these splendid open source projects

* Remy Sharp's [Wikitext javascript library](http://remysharp.com/2008/04/01/wiki-to-html-using-javascript/).
* [Extensionizr](http://extensionizr.com/), a Chrome extension boilerplate generator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
